original:
<DIALOG2>What do you think?<NEXT>[0x88][0x6e][0x0][0xa0][0x0]81[0x8f][0x0]8[0x86][0x0][0x0][0x9c]6[0x0][0x92]1[0x0][0xe9]Yes [0x92]1[0x11][0xe9]No[0x86]1[0x0][0x93][0x80]23[0xa5][0x80][0x0][0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>That's what I

ruins?<NEXT>I wonder if anyone
will ever be able<NEXT>to enter there
again?[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>What!?<NEXT>You say you can
get inside!?<NEXT>I don't believe
you...<NEXT>...Although I
suppose if you had
a flying machine,<NEXT>you could get in,
couldn't you?[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>We've been on the
lookout for anything
unusual<NEXT>since those pirates
showed up.<NEXT>We've also
increased the
number of officers<NEXT>on patrol--that's
what I'm doing
right now.[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>I'm an arch-
aeologist...<NEXT>This stone wall
here looks to be
pretty old...<NEXT>Depending on what
I find, I might be<NEXT>able to make it the
subject of a paper![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0][0x9d][0x88]r[0x0][0xa2][0x0].3[0x8f][0x0]8[0x8b][0x0][0x0][0xf][0x0]Servbot 1

"We ain't gonna

it wasn't that loud...<NEXT>Sounded to me like
maybe it came from
down south?<NEXT>Maybe you should
look that way?[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>Well, there was a
noise, but it
wasn't that loud...<NEXT>But I felt a shock
through the ground.<NEXT>I just hope the
shock didn't<NEXT>activate any
Reaverbots...[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>There's not much
happening out this
way...<NEXT>There's nobody
here except for
the people who've<NEXT>come to see that
big hole the
pirates dug...[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>meow?[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>Really? A new

underground?<NEXT>I haven't seen
anything like that
around here...[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>Just when we
